t: LIST OF AMAZON BRANDS - WIKIPEDIA
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. s: Yes we get a sale; and I know Amazon say they own the images/ listings when we sign up, but in my opinion it's appalling, that having got Brand Registry, Trademark, copyright, design rights etc for MY products, this is being sold by Amazon to a Company for which we have no control over.
